title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.271 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.271 - Scope

State Regulations
(a) Sections
255.273 through
255.287
of this Part prescribe
minimum requirements for joining materials in pipelines, other than by
welding. (b) These sections do not
apply to joining during the manufacture of pipe or pipeline
components. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.271

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
